channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Eastergate to design a contemporary garden for Rob and Helen with space for them to entertain.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan and the team create a spectacular Space Age garden for a war hero and his young family in rural Cornwall.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A Victorian mirror and some acclaimed works of art go under the hammer. And will an extremely collectable consignment of wine get the auction's juices flowing? Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team head to Banbury to surprise young carers who help look after their mother, and transform their indoor and outdoor spaces.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team of experts transform both the house and the garden in Eltham for the family of a young boy with dystonic quadriplegic cerebral palsy.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Water Babies
channel.desc: A young chimney sweep falsely accused of theft escapes into a river, entering a magical animated underwater world where he helps free captive Water Babies. A British classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Detonator - Death Train
channel.desc: Action. Terrorists place an atomic bomb on a hijacked train. The UN assembles a crack task force to take them out. Stars Pierce Brosnan, Patrick Stewart and Christopher Lee.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Commandos
channel.desc: Action. World War II. Allied commandos are parachuted into North Africa on a mission to infiltrate and hold an Axis-held fort until reinforcements arrive. Lee Van Cleef stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: I'm Not Feeling Myself Tonight
channel.desc: Hapless Jon Pigeon works in a sex research institute. To seduce a colleague, he invents an aphrodisiac-emitter machine turning any man or woman into a horny fiend. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Detonator - Death Train
channel.desc: Action. Terrorists place an atomic bomb on a hijacked train. The UN assembles a crack task force to take them out. Stars Pierce Brosnan, Patrick Stewart and Christopher Lee.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: In The Spotlight
channel.desc: Exploring the working lives of musicians working in London's West End from 1950s Soho, jazz clubs and theatre up to the present day.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Bristol to create a Mediterranean-inspired space that will rekindle happy holiday memories for young couple Emily and Maurice.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Black Beauty
channel.desc: Faithful version of classic children's tale featuring the adventures of spirited horse Black Beauty. Can her young owner get her back? Mark Lester - of Oliver! fame - stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Battle of Britain - Empty Skies
channel.desc: Interviews with 19 men and women who were part of the Battle of Britain - unique accounts of the parts they played in the nation's defence, in their own words.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Assassination Bureau
channel.desc: Action. Would-be journalist Sonya Winter investigates the Assassination Bureau, a mysterious organization. Ollie Reed and Diana Rigg star.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Buster
channel.desc: Comedy. The story of Great Train Robber Buster Edwards, a small-timer who fell in with more ambitious thieves. Phil Collins and Julie Walters star.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
channel.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.[(96057)]
